message.content: This question requires knowledge about the composition of Kool-aid. Kool-aid is a mix of sucrose (sugar) crystals and flavors that are dissolved in a liquid base of water. Option (A) is incorrect because there is no sugar casing involved in Kool-aid. Option (B) is incorrect because Kool-aid is not a soda pop. Option (D) is incorrect because Kool-aid is not made from sugar candy bought at a store.

Option (D) is incorrect because Kool-aid is not made from sugar candy.
